mapper.select: SELECT id, username, nickname, phone, email, create_date, sns_type, auth FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE NICKNAME = #{nickname}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{pwd}

choose.when: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, CREATE_DATE, SNS_TYPE, AUTH) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{pwd}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, SYSDATE, #{sns_Type}, 0)
choose.otherwise: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, USERNAME, NICKNAME, PHONE, EMAIL, CREATE_DATE, SNS_TYPE, AUTH) VALUES (#{id}, #{username}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{email}, SYSDATE, #{sns_Type}, 0)

mapper.select: SELECT ID FROM MEMBER WHERE USERNAME = #{username} AND EMAIL = #{email}
